title: Exchangily Wallet
welcomeText: Welcome to Exchangily. To begin you may create a new wallet or import an existing one.
setPasswordConditions: Enter password which is minimum 8 characters long and contains at least 1 uppercase, lowercase, number and a special character using !@#$&*~`%^()-_
setPasswordNote: Note: For Password reset you have to keep the mnemonic safe as that is the only way to recover the wallet
warningBackupMnemonic: Please accurately record and securely store the following twelve word mnemonic, do not disclose the mnemonic anybody else. Disclosure of your mnemonic will result in your account being compromised and you will lose all of your funds.
warningImportOrConfirmMnemonic: Please type in your 12 word mnemonic phrase in the correct sequence to confirm
serverTimeoutPleaseTryAgainLater: Server Timeout, Please try again later
passwordConditions: Please enter the password that satisfy above conditions
passwordRetype: Please retype the same password in both fields
dialogManagerTypeSamePasswordNote: Type the same password which you have entered while creating the wallet
pleaseFillAllTheTextFieldsCorrectly: Please fill all the text fields correctly
addGasTransactionSuccess: Add gas transaction was made successfully
genericError: An error occured. Try again later.
closeTheApp: Do you want to close the app
userReturnedByPressingBackButton: User returned by pressing the back button
yourWithdrawMinimumAmountaIsNotSatisfied: Your withdraw minimum amount is not satisfied
placeOrderTransactionSuccessful: Place order transaction was made successfully
testVersion: You are using the test version
tapHereToEnterInCampaign: Tap here to enter in campaign
pasteExgAddress: Tap on wallet icon to paste Exg Wallet Address
pleaseCheckYourEmailToActivateYourAccoun: Please check your email to activate your account
loadOrdersFailed: Could not load orders, Please try again later
pleaseEnterAmountLessThanYourWallet: Please enter the amount equals or less than your available wallet balance
paymentDescriptionNote: Please fill this field to confirm the order
afterHyphenWhenYouMakePayment: after hyphen when you make payment
resetPasswordEmailInstruction: Please check your email and follow instructions to reset your account password
orderCancelledNotification: Your order has been cancelled successfully
orderUpdateNotification: Your order status has been updated successfully
marketPriceFetchFailed: Could not fetch the market price at the moment, please try again later
backupMnemonicNoticeTitle: What is mnemonic? Why it is so important to backup mnemonic phrases?
backupMnemonicNoticeContent: A mnemonic phrase is a list of words which store all the information needed to recover virtual coin funds on-chain. Wallet software will typically generate a mnemonic phrase and instruct the user to write it down on paper. If the user's computer breaks or their hard drive becomes corrupted, they can download the same wallet software again and use the paper backup to get their virtual coins back. Anybody else who discovers the phrase can steal the virtual coins, so it must be kept safe like jewels or cash. For example, it must not be typed into any website. A mnemonic phrase are an excellent way of backing up and storing bitcoins and so they are used by almost all well-regarded wallets.
question: Question
freeFabSuccess: Your will get your FAB shortly, Thank you
freeFabUsedAlready: Free FAB feature has been used already
clickOnWebsiteButton: or click on website button to download the latest version from the official Exchangily site
pleaseCorrectTheFormatOfReceiveAddress: Please correct the format of receive address
pleaseTransferFundsToExchangeWalletToUse: Please transfer funds to exchange wallet to use bindpay
noInternetWarning: Cannot load the content as your device is not to the internet
buySellInstruction1: Make sure you have coin balance to trade
settingsShowcaseInstructions: Show instructions for how to use certain app features
walletDashboardInstruction1: Please add gas by using FAB coin to use wallet and exchange features
walletDashboardInstruction2: Transfer funds from wallet to exchange to trade and use bindpay
transferFundsToExchangeUsingDepositButto: Please transfer funds to exchange using deposit button in wallet dashboard
tsWalletNote: The coinpool (managed by consensus) holds deposited funds for withdrawal, and is controlled collectively by the miners of the kanban blockchain.
specialWithdrawNote: For some coins, the exchange allows users to select which blockchain they would like to withdraw. If many users withdraw to the same blockchain, there may be an imbalance of available funds to withdraw between the two chains.
specialWithdrawFailNote: In this case, withdraws on one chain may be temporarily unavailable, and you may withdraw a smaller amount, or withdraw to another chain.
specialExchangeBalanceNote: The displayed exchange balance is shared for coins that exist on multiple blockchains. Withdraws may be made to the chain of your choice.
availableBalanceInfoContent: The available balance reflects the total value of your unspent transactions outputs (utxos) for transactions that have already been confirmed on the blockchain so user can only use current available balance for the new transactions until the previous transactions complete
unConfirmedBalanceInfoContent: The unconfirmed balance reflects the total value of your unspent transactions outputs (utxos) for transactions that are still pending (not yet confirmed on the blockchain)
unConfirmedBalanceInfoExample: This is the normal transaction process where unconfirmed funds may be more than the amount user sends. For example, when you purchase 50 dollars worth of groceries in a cash transaction and you give the shopkeeper a 100 dollar bill, then you get your change(50 dollars) back by the shopkeeper
pleaseSetupDeviceSecurity: Please setup the device security either using Pin/Password or Biometric in the phone app settings
withdrawPopupNote: Please confirm the coin you want to withdraw
lockedOutTemp: Too many failed attempts, please try after sometime.
lockedOutPerm: Too many failed attempts, please try to unlock using Pin or Password
importantWalletUpdateNotice: Invalid password: If you fill the valid password then please delete the current wallet in Settings and then re-import, to use the latest wallet
askWalletRestore: Do you want to restore existing wallet
walletVerificationFailed: Current wallet is not compatible with the update, please delete the wallet and re-import again.
walletUpdateNoticeDecription: Please provide the wallet password to verify and install the latest update
